description: Pre-recorded 3-minute seminar presentation on a research paper followed by peer reviews of other students' seminars. Includes translating scientific content into plain English for non-expert audiences.

Individual scientific paper (4-6 pages) based on data collected during a compulsory 4-day field trip to Smiths Lake. Written under exam conditions with a 2-hour time limit, requiring literature review and referencing.

2-hour supervised exam with multiple choice and short answer questions covering lecture material from weeks 1-10. Includes sections on marine chemistry, biology, oceanography, and post-week 6 content.
